message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.CY 

Reasoning: The paper deals with security threats in reinforcement learning and control, which are both subfields of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also involves optimization and convex optimization, which are common topics in the machine learning and control communities. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses attack feasibility and cost, which are related to security and cryptography, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves experiments, which could fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
